extendedInfo.description: Are you addicted to shopping and fashion? Do you dream of being a supermodel? Love to go on dates?  Do it all and become the TOP GIRL!Create FABULOUS outfits and have fun with your new boyfriend. Kiss him, buy him gifts, and go on exciting dates! Capture and save photos of all your special moments together!Download TOP GIRL on your Android device and PLAY NOW!Features:- GET THE PERFECT LOOK with 600+ unique shoes, purses, accessories & clothes!- FLIRT WITH & DATE 250+ hot guys of your choice! - STRUT YOUR STUFF and kick off a blazing hot modeling career!- GO OUT & PARTY at over 20 fabulous parties and clubs!- JET SET from LA to NYC!__________________________________________Payments FAQ:Does Top Girl allow in-game payments?Top Girl is a free-to-play game, but like many games in the App Store, there is the option of purchasing in-game items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if youâd like to disable this feature.__________________________________________About CrowdStarCrowdStar is a global leader in the social gaming industry with a community of millions of gamers. CrowdStar has created some of the most popular fashion games including It Girl https://www.facebook.com/crowdstarsitgirl and Top Girl, in addition to other addictive casual games like Happy Aquarium https://www.facebook.com/happyaquariumgame and Happy Pets https://www.facebook.com/happypetsgame.CONTACT SUPPORT: TopGirlHelp@crowdstar.com (Please specify which Android device you're using.)FAQs: http://support.crowdstar.comVISIT US: http://www.crowdstar.com/games/top_girlLIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/TopGirlAndroidFOLLOW US: @TopGirlGame

reviews.title: Luv it! :)
reviews.comment: Very fun and entertaining highly recommend this game.But if someone could join me and help me out that would be awesome haha:)
reviews.author: Shayla Eskandar

reviews.title: Cool but ...
reviews.comment: Really fun game but its takes a lot of time to collect\"energy\" so u cant work for a while but cool app
reviews.author: Briece Graham

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I really like the game it\'s uber cute and fun, very addicting. Only problem is the app. closes within 4 min. but I still like it alot please fix and will make 5. Sanyo zio. :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best app for my nieces to play they are so in love with this game I mean everytime they see me they be like can I PLEASE see your phone I\'m like sure then when I get my phone back I have 2% as my battery
reviews.author: Lee B

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I downloaded this on my phone and when I pressed next, it made me exit the game.  Now I\'m on a Samsung Galaxy Tab. I pressed the app and it said something went wrong please try again later -_-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very slow
reviews.comment: I think it takes up alot of time to download and every minute or so it freezes and goes back to my cell phone\'s home screen
reviews.author: Dayana Contreras

reviews.title: Okay game.
reviews.comment: When I press the\"Do Job\" button, the bar moves forward, stands still and even moves backwards.  This alone makes me want to uninstall. This needs to be fixed!
reviews.author: Jessica Stinson

reviews.title: Delicous and awesome
reviews.comment: Cool and awesome game
reviews.author: Michelee Ivey

reviews.comment: I love it. You actually get to interact with your friends, boyfriends, etc. Shopping costes are low in coins... and also the fact that its fun
reviews.author: Sissy naNa

reviews.title: Good but. Boys
reviews.comment: The boyfriends only stay 2 days why and also it makes you pay money two keep them!  But its still cool!
reviews.author: jeff barber

reviews.title: Just horrible..
reviews.comment: This is just crap! Everytime i try and open the app up so i can play a add comes up, when i exit the add it waits like 3 seconds and crashes iv tried serveral time !!.
reviews.author: Shaii Meskis

reviews.title: Exelent
reviews.comment: This game is soooooo...........amazing. It lets u work as a model and then spend all your money on clothes and your boyfriend.
reviews.author: Joanne Tritton

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: It just closes after he ad that shows up. D\342\202\254L\342\202\254TE
reviews.author: Siren Ducky

reviews.title: Me!?!?!
reviews.comment: I have had this game for a while now and it hasnt worked for lg motion for a month and its depressing... it starts loadin but then goes back to the home screen in my phone please fix!!!
reviews.author: Stacey Renee

reviews.title: No fashion points
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game, however, there have been pieces of clothing i have bought cash that dont give me fashion points. I put them on and nothing goes to my style. This is a big issue since i used the cash for them.
reviews.author: Summer Beasley

reviews.title: Great, until
reviews.comment: Stops loading for three  dayd snd I lose \"boyfriend\" and cash for downloads. I have uninstalled snd re installed 3 times now...fix this already!! Happened on iPhone and pc when I have played in past
reviews.author: Noelle Quartararo

reviews.title: Pretty nice but...
reviews.comment: It was a nice game but I  need to buy cash i dont have anymore and i need the full version of it!!pls help.   I
reviews.author: Minori Pagdanganan

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: Love It Girl so I decided to get Top Girl for my phone so I can play this game wherever I am
reviews.author: Lya Yoville

reviews.title: its ok...
reviews.comment: its alright but i LOVE LOVE LOVE! The old version i wish you guys never update it i loved the old fashion Top Girl app where you can walk around places and flirt shop and stuff like real life please turn it back to old verstion  :,(

reviews.title: 0 star
reviews.comment: I can\'t even see the content of this game!! Crashes at start. Im on android. Fix it!
